allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npm install --save-dev @tauri-apps/cli@latest vite @vitejs/plugin-react typescript && npm install @tauri-apps/api@latest react react-dom")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initial commit - ModOne PLC simulator project

Features implemented:
- Tauri v2 desktop application structure \(Rust + React\)
- Panel system with drag-and-drop support
- Tab system with lazy loading and context menus
- Theme system \(light/dark/system\)
- i18n support \(English, Korean, Japanese\)
- Settings dialog with multiple categories
- Project Manager with recent projects
- Auto-save functionality
- Zustand state management
- Task Master AI integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: set up end-to-end testing infrastructure with Playwright

- Install @playwright/test and configure for Tauri app testing
- Create playwright.config.ts with chromium project and webServer config
- Add test utilities: selectors, app lifecycle helpers, and common operations
- Create test fixtures with mock configs and expected layouts
- Implement initial E2E test suites for project, layout, and modbus features
- Add data-testid attributes to key components for reliable test selection
- Add npm scripts: test:e2e, test:e2e:ui, test:e2e:headed, test:e2e:debug

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Content .taskmaster/tasks/tasks.json | ConvertFrom-Json | ForEach-Object { $_master.tasks | Select-Object id, title, status | Format-Table -AutoSize }")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\chanh\\Projects\\ModOne" add src/components/OneCanvas/blockDefinitions.ts src/components/OneCanvas/Wire.tsx src/components/OneCanvas/components/AnimatedWire.tsx src/components/OneCanvas/hooks/useCanvasKeyboardShortcuts.ts src/components/OneCanvas/hooks/useWireDrawing.ts src/components/OneCanvas/types.ts src/components/OneCanvas/utils/circuitGraph.ts src/components/OneCanvas/utils/connectionValidator.ts src/components/OneCanvas/utils/serialization.ts src/components/panels/content/OneCanvasPanel.tsx src/stores/canvasStore.ts src/stores/documentRegistry.ts src/stores/hooks/useCanvasDocument.ts)
